edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter
Class KernelFilterND

java.lang.Object
  edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.Filter
      edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.filter.KernelFilterND

public class KernelFilterND
extends Filter

Filters an Image in an arbitrary number of dimensions using a specified kernel.

Currently only supports independent kernels for each dimension, such that at any point, the filtering due to the combination of kernels is the product of the filtering by the kernel in each dimension.

Author:
Colin J. Fuller

addDimensionWithKernel

public void addDimensionWithKernel(java.lang.Integer dimension,
                                   double[] kernel)
Adds a dimension to be filtered. The integer dimension must be specified by the same integer used to specify it in an ImageCoordinate. The kernel can have any size >= 1, and it must have an odd number of elements.

Parameters:
dimension - The dimension to filter.
kernel - The kernel that will be applied to the specified dimension.
